member.name: M:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.ICoreLocalizationBuilder.RecordDeviceReportedLocale(System.String)
member.summary: Records a device reported locale in the database if it doesn't already exist
member.param: raw locale value passed by a client deivce. eg. "en-us", accept-language header "en_US,en;q=0.8"
member.returns: The new or existing identifier for the locale code reported by the deivice

member.name: T:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.ILanguageFamily
member.summary: A "Language Family" represents a collection of related locales. Eg. The American English (en_us) and British English (en_uk) locales would both be part of the "English" Language Family (en)

member.name: P:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.ILanguageFamily.Name
member.summary: Name of the language in English (eg. Korean could be "Korean")

member.name: P:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.ILanguageFamily.NativeName
member.summary: Name of the language in that native language (eg. Korean could be "한국어")

member.name: P:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.ILanguageFamily.LanguageCode
member.summary: Language code, generally following ISO standards (eg. Korean could be "ko")

member.name: T:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IDeviceReportedLocale
member.summary: Represents a locale that was provided to roblox by a device/client by a user of the system. Does not necessarily correspond to any Supported Locale that Roblox uses in the system

member.name: P:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IDeviceReportedLocale.DeviceReportedLocaleId
member.summary: ID of the Device Reported Locale

member.name: P:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IDeviceReportedLocale.StandardizedLocale
member.summary: Standardized locale code. eg "en_us"

member.name: P:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IDeviceReportedLocale.LanguageFamily
member.summary: Language Family that the device reported locale is associated with. Can be null

member.name: P:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IDeviceReportedLocale.SupportedLocale
member.summary: Supported locale associated with locale. Can be null

member.name: M:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IObservedLocaleEntityTranslator.TranslateObservedLocaleEntityWithDefaults(Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IObservedLocaleEntity)
member.summary: Converts IObservedLocaleEntity to ILocaleInformation. For given IObservedLocaleEntity If Language null then we use default language. If SupportedLocale is null then we use language to get respective supported locale If language not found in DB then we use default locale.
member.returns: ILocaleInformation

member.name: M:Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IObservedLocaleEntityTranslator.TranslateObservedLocaleEntity(Roblox.Platform.Localization.Core.IObservedLocaleEntity)
member.summary: Converts IObservedLocaleEntity to ILocaleInformation. No defaults used.
member.returns: ILocaleInformation
